channel.title: We Want MoR Superman
channel.description: Join Steven and Brian for a short adventure into another Rational Fic — The Metropolitan Man, by Alexander Wales! Steven will play the role of the tour guide while doing his best to not spoil any of the surprises and Brian will play the seasoned adventurer who is new to this particular work.
channel.itunes:summary: Join Steven and Brian for a short adventure into another Rational Fic — The Metropolitan Man, by Alexander Wales!
channel.itunes:author: Steven Zuber & Brian Deacon

item.title: Chapters 11–12
item.content:encoded:
Masks are coming off as the end approaches…

Next episode we will be covering chapter 13, the final chapter.

Original chapters, written by Alexander Wales, can be read here or on fanfiction.net and the audiobook chapters, recorded by Eneasz Brodski, can be found on the website.

We Want MoR Superman feed: https://gorkyr.github.io/Custom-Podcast-Feeds/we-want-mor-superman.rss

We Want MoR Superman + Audiobook feed: https://gorkyr.github.io/Custom-Podcast-Feeds/we-want-mor-superman-audiobook.rss

Thanks Coy!

item.itunes:summary: Masks are coming off as the end approaches…
item.itunes:author: Steven Zuber

item.title: Chapters 9–10
item.content:encoded:
Uh oh. Someone has gone and killed Martha Kent. I’m sure Superman will take it well.

Next episode we will be covering chapters 11 and 12.

Original chapters, written by Alexander Wales, can be read here or on fanfiction.net and the audiobook chapters, recorded by Eneasz Brodski, can be found on the website.

We Want MoR Superman feed: https://gorkyr.github.io/Custom-Podcast-Feeds/we-want-mor-superman.rss

We Want MoR Superman + Audiobook feed: https://gorkyr.github.io/Custom-Podcast-Feeds/we-want-mor-superman-audiobook.rss

Thanks Coy!

item.title: Chapters 7–8
item.content:encoded:
Superman is showing psychological strain and Lex sends moles to Smallville.

Next episode we will be covering chapters 9 and 10.

Original chapters, written by Alexander Wales, can be read here or on fanfiction.net and the audiobook chapters, recorded by Eneasz Brodski, can be found on the website.

We Want MoR Superman feed: https://gorkyr.github.io/Custom-Podcast-Feeds/we-want-mor-superman.rss

item.title: Chapters 5–6
item.content:encoded:
Superman has a day job.

Next episode we will be covering chapters 7 and 8.

Original chapters, written by Alexander Wales, can be read here or on fanfiction.net and the audiobook chapters, recorded by Eneasz Brodski, can be found on the website.

item.title: Chapters 3–4
item.content:encoded:
Lex escalates his game against Superman.

Next episode we will be covering chapters 5 and 6.

Original chapters, written by Alexander Wales, can be read here or on fanfiction.net and the audiobook chapters, recorded by Eneasz Brodski, can be found on the website.

item.title: Chapters 1–2
item.content:encoded:
In this episode we dive into the world of 1930s Metropolis, where a strange man in a shiny suit has appeared from nowhere and begins thwarting violent crimes!

Next episode we will be covering chapters 3 and 4.

Original chapters, written by Alexander Wales, can be read here or on fanfiction.net and the audiobook chapters, recorded by Eneasz Brodski, can be found on the website.

item.title: Metropolitan Man Announcement
item.content:encoded:
Join Steven and Brian for a short adventure into another Rational Fic – The Metropolitan Man by Alexander Wales!

As always, be sure to check out the audiobook earlier in this feed. :)

Join us back here next week for the discussion on chapters 1 and 2!
